titleStmt.title: Vox ducis: or, An alarme from the trumpet of God to euery souldier in Iesus Christ. Calling them to fight the good fight of faith. In a sermon at Pauls Crosse, Sept. 11. 1631. by Iohn Robinson preacher of the word of God and Mr of Arts of Kings Coll. in Camb.
titleStmt.author: Robinson, John, preacher.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.
